messages.subject: Coin collection/care...where do we start?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, We just recently inherited some coins and need advice on how to care for them.  There are tons of books and supply catalogs etc out there.  Does anyone
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,
We just recently inherited some coins and need advice on how to care for them. There are tons of books and supply catalogs etc out there. Does anyone on the list have any personal recommendations?
Also on a related note, we have some coins and paper money from other countries that we would like to investigate (Who or what is on the coin, other denominations etc? ) store/display. Is there such a thing as a foreign coin book or do you have to investigate them individually. When the weather clears I will hit the library. Any help would be appreciated.
Thanks,
Beth in MD

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
